name: Google Bookmarks & History - Simple Header
description:
Simplify Google Bookmarks and Google Web History.

Updated(2009/8/9): 
  *The search form has appeared. You can use it now.
  *Google Web History has been also supported.

See also:
*Gmail - Simple Header: http://userstyles.org/styles/19999
*iGoogle - Simple Header: http://userstyles.org/styles/19998
*Google Maps - Simple: http://userstyles.org/styles/20701
